channel.title: Award on Staudi Apps & Games
channel.description: Recent content in Award on Staudi Apps & Games

item.title: Handelsblatt awards spritpreise.jetzt as best online portal
item.description:
Spritpreise.jetzt was awarded best online portal of 2025 in the fuel cost comparison category by Handelsblatt, a leading German newspaper focusing on business and finance.

This makes me incredibly proud, as it shows that the mission to make the fuel market more transparent is hitting the mark. Handelsblatt put the portals through their paces - from user-friendliness to added value for users.

You can read the entire Handelsblatt article here:
https://www.handelsblatt.com/unternehmen/dienstleister/ranking-das-sind-die-besten-online-portale-des-jahres-2025/100147184.html

item.title: Focus Money awards spritpreise.jetzt
item.description:
We are delighted to announce that spritpreise.jetzt has received an award in the current issue of Focus Money magazine (issue 30/2025)!

In the comprehensive study “Best Online Portals”, which was carried out by the analysis and consulting institute Service Value on behalf of Focus Money, users gave us a top rating in the “Fuel Cost Comparison” category.

This award means a great deal to us, as it is based directly on the opinions of over 94,000 consumers. Only portals that perform better than the overall average of all providers assessed within their sector receive a “top score” award.
